title: Gut Detox | Fullscript
cleaned_text: Disclaimer The Fullscript Integrative Medical Advisory team has developed or collected these protocols from practitioners and supplier partners to help health care practitioners make decisions when building treatment plans. By adding this protocol to your Fullscript template library, you understand and accept that the recommendations in the protocol are for initial guidance and may not be appropriate for every patient. Gut Detox Description: For patients with added gut symptomatology in conjunction with the increased toxic burden. Protocol: UltraClear Renew 2 scoops, once per day, for 4 weeks (working up to this amount, starting slow with titrate doses) [Download the US product monograph](https://public-assets.fullscript.com/misc/UltraClear_RENEW.pdf) AdvaClear 1 capsule, twice per day, for 4 weeks [Download the US product monograph](https://public-assets.fullscript.com/misc/AdvaClear.pdf) UltraFlora Balance 1 capsule, once per day, for 4 weeks [Download the US product monograph](https://public-assets.fullscript.com/misc/UltraFlora_Balance.pdf) SpectraZyme Complete 1 capsule, three times per day with meals, for 4 weeks [Download the US product monograph](https://public-assets.fullscript.com/misc/SpectraZyme_Complete.pdf) CandiBactin-BR 1-3 tablets, twice per day, for 4 weeks. [Download the US product monograph](https://public-assets.fullscript.com/misc/CandiBactin-BR.pdf) Lipo-Gen (if gall bladder symptoms) 2 tablets, three times per day with meals, for 4 weeks. [Download the US product monograph](https://public-assets.fullscript.com/misc/Lipo-Gen.pdf) Glutagenics 1 scoop, once per day, for 4 weeks.
